name: Saurabh Kumar
locations: Delhi, Near Nangloi Metro Station, Delhi -110086

full_output.summary: I'm a creative Front-End Developer skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I love using React.js and Tailwind to create beautiful, responsive web applications. My goal is to make the web a more user-friendly place, one project at a time. I'm always exploring new technologies and techniques to improve my work and deliver the best possible experience for users. Collaborative environments where I can contribute to and learn from a team, always aiming to deliver projects that are both visually stunning and highly functional.

projects.name: Tour Travel Website
projects.description: Designed and built a fully functional tour travel website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented features such as responsive design, interactive maps, and dynamic content to enhance user engagement and streamline navigation.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Created a weather application using APIs to fetch real-time weather data. Displays current weather conditions and forecasts, user-friendly interface, and responsive design.

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: Uses real-time exchange rates to convert amounts between different currencies. Converts currencies accurately, updates rates in real-time, clean and simple UI.
